name: Worm Game (WevDrazoon)
description:
You're a worm.   All you wanted to do is read a motivational book. 

Wiggle around, try to piece it together again!

Controls: ~wasd or arrow keys to move~ // ~space to jump (on critters?)~

My first project in Godot! This was made with the help of BornCG's Platformer  Tutorial~
